de.upb.t2t.control.gui.transcriber

Class TranscriptionMenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.MenuItem
      • de.upb.t2t.control.gui.transcriber.TranscriptionMenuItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class TranscriptionMenuItem
extends javafx.scene.control.MenuItem
    An implementation of the MenuItem class that will function as a part of the context menu of a WordButton. A TranscriptionMenuItem represents a TranscriptionItem and should it be clicked, then the menu will call TranscriptionItem.select().
    Author:
    Michel May (michel-may@gmx.de)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void setTickIcon(boolean visible)
